video.title: Maharana Pratap
video.synopsis: A brave and noble 16th-century king rises above other contenders for the crown to become a patriotic hero and protect his kingdom from invaders.

episodes.synopsis: In the kingdom of Mewar, a brave young prince ventures to an Afghan outpost to pick flowers for his mother, unaware that he risks being captured.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Plucking flowers in an Afghan outpost, Prince Pratap must face the consequences of his ignorance and find a way back to safety.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: When Sham Khan demands an apology from Prince Pratap at court, the Prince's refusal to comply could force Rana Udai Singh to pay a dear price.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Queen Jaivantabai makes Pratap own his mistake and make amends for entering Afghan territory; Rana Udai Singh sends a few brave soldiers into battle.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Prince Patrap faces a tough choice when he follows the king's servant, Devidas, to the Afghan outpost and sees him divulging sensitive information.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Chundawat saves Pratap from Shams Khan's soldiers, but when Pratap unmasks Devidas in front of the king, Chundawat is ordered to behead the traitor.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Agitated over his missing soldiers, Shams Khan plots against the Rajputs, but Rana Udai Singh holds a midnight meeting where his war plan is revealed.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: After Pratap overhears the king warn Jaivantabai of future hurdles, he and Soham follow the queen to a special location in search of the truth.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Chundawat warns the king of the superiority of Shams Khan's army; Prince Pratap fears for Jaivantavbai when she tells him the secret of the Jauhar.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: As the queens prepare for the Jauhar, Prince Pratap vows to save them from the ritual; Chundawat tips off the king about Shams Khan's attack plan.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Jaivantabai discloses a secret; Prince Pratap sneaks out of the palace with the ancestral sword; Shams Khan asks the king to gift the prince to him.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When Prince Pratap saves Shams Khan from attack, the king gives Shams Khan their ancestral weapons, but he secretly plans to take the prince far away.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Prince Pratap vows to wage war against the Afghans, despite his father's wishes; Pratap learns that a sleeping tonic has been prepared for him.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Queen Jaivantabai learns that Prince Pratap did not drink the potion that his father had prepared for him as part of the plan to divert him from war.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: The king lays out his strategy; upset with Pratap's misdeeds, the king orders soldiers to find and imprison his son; Bahadur rallies troops for war.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: When Shams Khan's soldier spots the king's sons in a bullock cart, Shams Khan declares war; not recognizing Pratap, Bahadur recruits him for his army.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The prince learns swordsmanship from Bahadur; the king readies for the war as his soldiers vow to destroy the Afghans; Shams Khan hunts for Pratap.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: The grand war begins; the prince comes out of hiding when he sees his father struggle with Afghan soldiers; Chundawat spots Prince Pratap fighting.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: As Bahadur's soldiers advance, Prince Pratap fights fiercely but is upset by the bloodshed; Chundawat tells the king about the prince's involvement.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: When Afghan soldiers trap Prince Pratap, Bahadur tries to save him; Shams Khan sends a soldier to stop the Jauhar; Pratap motivates his soldiers.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Shams Khan's soldiers force their way into the Rajput palace; Bahadur hands over the Mewar flag to Prince Pratap, who vows to hoist it.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Afghan soldiers attack Pratap and Bahadur; Shams Khan rejoices upon seeing the Mewar king unconscious; the prince tries to hoist his people's flag.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Prince Pratap grieves for his mentor; the Mewar flag is raised; Jaivantabai stops the Jauhar; Shams Khan surrenders before King Udai Singh.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: The king shows mercy to Shams Khan, on the condition certain demands are met, and expresses pride in his son, the prince, for his role in battle.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Shams Khan tries to understand Pratap's ethical code; Bahadur is cremated; Prince Pratap and King Udai Singh receive a grand welcome at the palace.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Queen Bhatiyani's anger over the war flares as others rejoice; the king asks Pratap to sit beside him at the feast, stirring up Prince Shakti's envy.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: As Prince Shakti grows more jealous of Prince Pratap, Bhatiyani, who wants to see her own son rule Mewar, reveals her intentions to destroy Pratap.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Jaivantabai enchants the king with song; Bhatiyani forces Kokoiya to treat her as the palace's queen and makes her take poison to test its effects.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Prince Pratap visits the village of Gaduliya, where he receives a splendid welcome, while Bhatiyani seethes and prepares a lethal cocktail for Pratap.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: As Chundawat tells the king of the praises Prince Pratap received at the village, Bhatiyani welcomes the prince with her deadly refreshment.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Bhatiyani rages when she learns King Udai Singh is in Jaivantabai's room; the king learns of the poisoned drink, but blame falls upon the wrong queen.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: King Udai Singh decides to declare the inheritor of the kingdom; Prince Shakti challenges Prince Pratap to find an exit passage in a secret tunnel.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Jaivantabai supports Bhatiyani's opposition to the king's declaration of his heir; when Soham gets stuck in the palace tunnel, Pratap cannot save him.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: The saint who saved Soham judges Pratap harshly and refuses to tutor him; Bhatiyani needles Sajjabai to suggest Prince Shakti as heir to the throne.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: After King Udai Singh appoints Raghavendra as mentor to his sons, Pratap demonstrates a character flaw he will need to overcome.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Jaivantabai wakes up to Bhatiyani's plotting ways and decides to teach her a lesson; Pratap gets hurt trying to complete Raghavendra's assignment.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: When Raghavendra bans Pratap from advancing, Pratap's fellow princes stand up for him; the king learns that Shams Khan is conspiring against Mewar.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: The king's secret informer is murdered; under pressure to declare Prince Shakti his successor, King Udai Singh urges Prince Pratap to prove himself.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Bhatiyani tries to make Pratap late for his lessons. Enraged that he is not the king's favorite, Shakti takes off with Pratap's horse.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Raghavendra exacts an unusual punishment upon Prince Pratap; Shams Khan and Shamsher plot to finish King Udai Singh and Prince Pratap.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Shams Khan sends the king a brutal message, to Shamsher's displeasure; guilt-ridden, Prince Pratap vows to win back the hearts of his people.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: After struggles with his mentor, Prince Pratap learns "Suryanamaskar" from the king, which angers his detractors; Bashar enters the Mewar territory.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Prince Pratap outshines the other students in the gurukul at performing "Suryanamaskar." Raghavendra assigns another task; Bhatiyani keeps plotting.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: When a student at the gurukul faints, Prince Shakti runs to the king; Prince Pratap follows Raghavendra's strict orders when the other students rebel.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: Raghavendra reveals the purpose of the wells; Jaivantabai cooks a feast for Pratap's friends; Bashar plans to kill Pratap at Mewar's wrestling match.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: When Raghavendra chafes at Pratap's failures, Chakrapani tells him of the prince's wound; the king suspects Bashar, who follows Pratap in the jungle.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Bashar wins Mewar's wrestling match, and Raghavendra makes him an offer; Jaivantabai searches for evidence in the attempted poisoning of Pratap.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: The palace doctor's findings push Jaivantabai to confront Bhatiyani, but she lacks the king's support; Bashar attacks Prince Pratap.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Refusing to believe Jaivantabai's accusations, the king banishes her from the palace; Pratap encounters spirits of the dead as he drowns in the river.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Found unconscious in a boat, Pratap struggles to recall what happened to him; Rana Udai Singh and Chundawat smell conspiracy behind Pratap's disaster.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: Jaivantabai has a change of heart about leaving the palace; Pratap, Soham and Chundawat start piecing together the puzzle of who attacked the prince.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: Bhatiyani wrestles with nightmares; Ahmed discovers Bashar's evil plans, but when Bashar pushes Pratap off a cliff, he lays the blame on Ahmed.
episodes.title: Episode 52
